title: Health claims on consumer products
context: Read a label that claims the product is healthy or organic.

content.bestLine: This product claims to be organic and healthy.

neutral.text: Check the label for health claims.
This product says it's good for you.
What does the label say about health benefits?
Let me read the health claims.
This product is labeled as natural.
I want to know what's in this product.

formal.text: The product label indicates it is a healthy choice.
I am examining the health claims on this product.
The packaging states it has health benefits.
I need to verify the health claims on this product.
The label claims this product is good for your health.

patterns.meaning: The product's label makes a specific health or environmental claim.
The speaker is seeking products with specific health or environmental attributes.

dialogs.description: Two friends discussing health claims on a product

lines.speaker: Friend 1
lines.text: This product says it's organic and healthy.

lines.speaker: Friend 2
lines.text: Let me see the label. Yes, it claims to have several health benefits.

dialogs.description: A customer asking a store clerk about health claims

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Excuse me, what does the label say about the health benefits of this product?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: It says here that it's made from natural ingredients and is good for your health.
